name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
schedule:
1.上課,考試與評分規則講解
2.Nomenclature of Organic Compounds
3.Alkenes and Their Reactions
4.Sterochemistry
5.Alkynes and Their Reactions
6.Molecular Orbital Theory
7.Substitution Reactions of Alkyl Halides
8.Elimination Reactions of Alkyl Halides
9.期中考
10.Alcohols, Ethers, and Sulfides
11.Organometallic Compounds
12.Radicals
13.Aromatic Compounds and Their Reactions
14.Reactions of Aldehydes and Ketones
15.Reactions of a,b-Unsaturated Carbonyl Compounds
16.Reactions at a-Carbon
17.Oxidation-Reduction Reactions
18.期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry
Paula Yurkanis Bruice
6th Ed.
